column1: The Birthday Toast was an event held each year at a small gathering in honour of both Bilbo Baggins and Frodo Baggins birthdays
column2: held each year on the 22nd of September at Bag End (both hobbits shared the same birthday).

column1: This custom began after Bilbo left Bag End after the celebration of his 111th birthday.
The Tolkien Society has upheld this tradition through a Birthday Toast in honour of the creator of Bilbo and Frodo - J.R.R. Tolkien and is held on the authors birthday
column3: each year. The toast itself is: "The Professor".
